DataListSpec.Name: Sponsorship Validation Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Sponsorship with No Sponsorship Extension Row
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_SPONSORSHIPWITHNOEXTENSIONROW(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
select ID, SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID, CONSTITUENTID, (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME (CONSTITUENTID)) as CONSTITUENTNAME, DATEADDED from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where not exists (select s_ext.ID from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION s_ext where s_ext.ID = SPONSORSHIP.ID) and STATUSCODE = 1
